channel.title: Micro.blog for Mac
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.5.1
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added auto-saving draft posts to your Mac and prompting to save a draft to Micro.blog when closing without publishing.
  • Fixed new sidebar Replies and Bookshelves rows when using an external blog.
  • Fixed Uploads to select image when right-clicking.

item.title: Version 2.5
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added viewing and editing your replies.
  • Added new Bookshelves pane to manage books you're reading or want to blog about. Right-click or control-click on a book for more options.
  • Fixed some other potential bugs with slow internet connections and errors.

item.title: Version 2.4.4
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Fixed including photos in Day One export. Thanks @otaviocc!
  • Fixed accidentally converting PNGs to JPEGs when attaching to a post.

item.title: Version 2.4.3
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added right-click menu to Uploads screen for copying link or opening image.
  • Fixed opening photo windows from the timeline.
  • Fixed crash when uploading videos without a Micro.blog Premium subscription.

item.title: Version 2.4.2
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added right-click context menu for Posts and Pages with options to open post in browser or copy link.
  • Fixed opening some photos at full size from timeline.

item.title: Version 2.4.1
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added HTML syntax highlighting along with Markdown.
  • Fixed photo scaling in preview window.
  • Fixed cursor not changing back to an arrow over posts list.

item.title: Version 2.4
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added View menu → Preview when writing a blog post. The preview floats over other windows and will show you what the current Markdown or HTML will look like.
  • Fixed posts list not updating when saving a new draft.
  • Fixed post button for drafts to show that the draft will be published. Use File → Save to keep saving as a draft on Micro.blog.

item.title: Version 2.3
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added File → Import → Blog Archive to preview and import .bar files.
  • Added double-clicking on .bar files in Finder to open them for importing.
  • Improved .bar export to more closely match format from Micro.blog.

item.title: Version 2.2
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added File → "Schedule Post" menu command to set date to publish in the future. This is enabled for new posts or drafts.
  • Added return key for opening selected items in Posts, Pages, and Uploads screens.
  • Changed File → "Save Draft" to save to Micro.blog without closing the editing window.
  • Fixed posts screen text color when window not frontmost.

item.title: Version 2.1.2
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added View menu → "Go to User" menu command to quickly open someone's profile by username.
  • Added publishing progress pane to top of Timeline after posting.
  • Updated row selection in Posts and Pages to be full-width to better match Timeline selection.
  • Fixed account toolbar item background color in Dark Mode. Thanks @vincode!

item.title: Version 2.1.1
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Fixed file export issue that would cause blog export with many photos to get increasingly slower, sometimes crashing.
  • Fixed notification bar color for new messages to better fit in Dark Mode.
  • Fixed uploading animated GIFs in new posts.

item.title: Version 2.1
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added emoji topics pop-up menu to Discover.
  • Added export menu for WordPress, Blog Archive Format, Markdown folder, and Day One.
  • Fixed posting window to disable smart quotes.

item.title: Version 2.0.5
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Improved post search to use server to include all matching posts (for search terms over 3 characters).
  • Added web site URL to user profile screens.
  • Updated sidebar icons to be lighter when window isn't frontmost.
  • Fixed disabling categories menu item for pages.
  • Fixed text-substitution problems when writing a new post.
  • Fixed potential crash when loading posts without a date.

item.title: Version 2.0.4
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Updated photos import to support new export file format from Instagram.
  • Updated categories pane to automatically show when categories are set.
  • Fixed editing categories on existing posts.
  • Fixed crash when uploading video for non-Premium subscribers.
  • Fixed photo upload to be more consistent from the open dialog or dragged files.

Special thanks to Daniel Jalkut for contributing some of these bug fixes!

item.title: Version 2.0.3
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Updated for new "Apple Silicon" M1-based Macs.
  • Fixed selecting main timeline window when clicking on new post window.

item.title: Version 2.0.2
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Fixed accidentally showing tab bar in new post windows.
  • Fixed background in new post window if Dark Mode changes while app is running.
  • Fixed remembering new post window position.
  • Fixed potential crash when clearing posts search.
  • Fixed error when opening prefs window for some settings.
  • Fixed photo window default size resetting.
  • Fixed copyright year in about box.
  • Updated camera icon on macOS 11 Big Sur.

item.title: Version 2.0.1
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Fixed sidebar background in Dark Mode.
  • Fixed leftover Favorite button instead of Bookmark.

...plus all the changes for Micro.blog 2.0:

  • Moved new post and reply to its own window.
  • Added new Pages and Uploads sections.
  • Renamed Favorites to Bookmarks and added New Bookmark menu command.
  • Updated with new icons and toolbar, ready for macOS 11 Big Sur.
  • Added Copy HTML button when viewing uploaded photos.
  • Added new microblog://bookmark?url= URL scheme.
  • Added read links in Bookmarks for Micro.blog Premium.
  • Many other minor fixes.

item.title: Version 2.0
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Moved new post and reply to its own window.
  • Added new Pages and Uploads sections.
  • Renamed Favorites to Bookmarks and added New Bookmark menu command.
  • Updated with new icons and toolbar, ready for macOS 11 Big Sur.
  • Added Copy HTML button when viewing uploaded photos.
  • Added new microblog://bookmark?url= URL scheme.
  • Added read links in Bookmarks for Micro.blog Premium.
  • Many other minor fixes.

item.title: Version 1.9.3
item.description:
A few bug fixes for this update:

  • Fixed crash importing photos from Instagram archive.
  • Fixed not showing error message when posting fails.
  • Fixed window and split view divider resizing.

item.title: Version 1.9.2
item.description:
Just one change:

  • Switched to using the macOS system font.

item.title: Version 1.9.1
item.description:
Ready for macOS 10.15 Catalina! Changes:

  • Fixed post selection options popover on macOS Catalina.
  • Updated for "notarization" to avoid launch warnings.

item.title: Version 1.9
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added new Open option when clicking a post to open it in your web browser. Useful for copying the link or viewing the post on the author's blog.
  • Added icons for Reply, Favorite, and Conversation.
  • Fixed error reporting when posting fails and during timeline loading.
  • Fixed photo compression to be more consistent across Micro.blog platform.

item.title: Version 1.8.2
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added window width resizing. Finally!
  • Added video thumbnail previews in Posts list.
  • Fixed setting alt text on multiple photos.

item.title: Version 1.8.1
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Fixed uploading videos in some formats.

If you have any questions about upgrading your blog to support video hosting, let us know at help@micro.blog. Thanks!

item.title: Version 1.8
item.description:
New features in this version:

  • Added video upload for Micro.blog-hosted blogs. Video support is designed for short videos, about 2 minutes or less, and uses the same hosting plan as podcasting.
  • Fixed scaling of uploaded photos that were too small before.

Plus recent improvements in version 1.7 for saving draft posts on Micro.blog-hosted blogs, which you can see in the video on Manton's blog post here.

item.title: Version 1.7
item.description:
New features for Micro.blog-hosted blogs:

  • Added support for saving a post as a draft to publish later (File menu → Save Draft).
  • Added a new "Posts" section to search and edit your recent posts.

For a quick demo of these new features, see the video on Manton's blog post here.

item.title: Version 1.6
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added setting categories on new posts. Create categories in Micro.blog on the web (Posts → Categories) and then show the categories pane on macOS (View menu → Categories).
  • Fixed character counter in Dark Mode.

item.title: Version 1.5.1
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Just a couple improvements to Dark Mode in this version:

  • Fixed adapting to system appearance changes so that Micro.blog doesn't need to be restarted after changing to Dark Mode.
  • Fixed background color in photo window for Dark Mode.

item.title: Version 1.5
item.description:
Changes in this version:

  • Added support for Dark Mode on macOS Mojave.
  • Added username auto-complete when composing a new post.
  • Fixed crash when posting photos without accessibility text.
  • Fixed crash if a photo could not be opened in a new window.
  • Fixed incorrect width/height when posting photos to an external blog.

item.title: Version 1.4.1
item.description:
Just a quick bug fix update because version 1.4 accidentally enabled Dark Mode before it was ready. Other changes from version 1.4:

  • Added clicking on a photo in the timeline to open it in a new window.
  • Added setting alt text on photos for accessibility. Click the photo thumbnail before posting to your blog.
  • Improved how the navigation animates when opening a conversation or user profile.

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description:
New in this version:

  • Added clicking on a photo in the timeline to open it in a new window.
  • Added setting alt text on photos for accessibility. Click the photo thumbnail before posting to your blog.
  • Improved how the navigation animates when opening a conversation or user profile.

item.title: Version 1.3.3
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Just a couple changes in this version:

  • Added a menu when viewing a user with options for muting and reporting the user.
  • Fixed an issue remembering the media upload URL for posting photos to external servers.

item.title: Version 1.3.2
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Just one change in this version:

  • Updated who someone is following to show users you don't follow yet.

item.title: Version 1.3.1
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Changes in this version:

  • Fixed creating replies from Instagram import. Micro.blog now removes the "@" if an Instagram caption begins with an Instagram username.
  • Plus the new Instagram import from version 1.3, available under the File menu.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Changes in this version:

  • Added Instagram archive import. File → Import from Instagram.
  • Fixed width/height attributes on external blog posts for non-square photos.

item.title: Version 1.2.1
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Just a couple bug fixes:

  • Fixed clearing out all account settings when choosing File → Sign Out.
  • Fixed saving the current text as a draft.

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Changes for this version:

  • Added multiple account support. You can add a new account in the preferences window.
  • Added switching between multiple Micro.blog-hosted blogs when you have more than one on the same account. Click the hostname at the bottom of the posting view.
  • Fixed underscores in URLs showing italics in Markdown.
  • Fixed using font size preference in Discover.

item.title: Version 1.1.4
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Changes for this version:

  • Added View → Title Field menu item to show or hide the title field. Title still automatically shows when typing over 280 characters, but won't disappear.
  • Fixed character count to reflect characters used in published blog post, without markup.
  • Fixed keyboard shortcut for Format → Link menu item.
  • Fixed opening Micro.blog conversations from a link in the timeline.

item.title: Version 1.1.3
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Just a few bug fixes:

  • Fixed compatibility with some XML-RPC servers.
  • Fixed crash on discover link and when Micro.blog servers are down.
  • Fixed crash pasting images into a new post.
  • Updated user profile to truncate very long descriptions.

item.title: Version 1.1.2
item.description:
Thanks for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Fixed opening some types of Micro.blog URLs in the app.
  • Changed keyboard shortcut for Format → Link to ⌘-K to match other apps.

item.title: Version 1.1.1
item.description:
Happy New Year! Thank you for supporting Micro.blog. Changes for this update:

  • Added support for starting a new post with a URL: microblog://post?text=Hello
  • Fixed Markdown highlighting for underscores in usernames or links.
  • Fixed photo upload for Movable Type blogs.
  • Fixed pasting from some copied Safari links.
  • Fixed crash on startup when no internet connection.
  • Fixed handling some links to the Micro.blog web site from the timeline.

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Added new Mac app icon!
  • Added a "Show More" button to load more posts in the timeline.
  • Fixed opening main window when clicking on Dock icon.
  • Fixed not refreshing user information and profile photo on launch.
  • Fixed XML-RPC issues with some custom blogging servers.

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description: Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! This is the final 1.0 release. If you have any suggestions for new features, let us know at help@micro.blog.

item.title: Version 1.0b19
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Updated keychain and internal preferences. You will be prompted to sign in again.
  • Moved older sandboxed container files to the Trash if they are there from a previous version. Should fix some issues with preferences being lost.

item.title: Version 1.0b18
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Fixed post text disappearing from timeline.

Plus the recent changes from 1.0b17:

  • Added text size preference.
  • Improved timeline to bounce when scrolled.
  • Fixed hiding the new posts message pane.
  • Fixed preferences window controls hiding as needed.
  • Fixed text selection for Markdown shortcuts.

item.title: Version 1.0b17
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Added text size preference.
  • Improved timeline to bounce when scrolled.
  • Fixed hiding the new posts message pane.
  • Fixed preferences window controls hiding as needed.
  • Fixed text selection for Markdown shortcuts.

item.title: Version 1.0b16
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Fixed issues hiding the attached photos pane.
  • Fixed uploading to scale down photos.
  • Fixed undo in post text box.

item.title: Version 1.0b15
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Fixed not being able to click or select text in post editing pane.
  • Fixed potential layout issue in welcome window (hopefully).
  • Improved main window to allow closing. Re-opens when app icon clicked or command-0.

item.title: Version 1.0b14
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Added new featured posts in the Discover section.
  • Added support for long posts with titles. Type or paste more than 280 characters to reveal a title field.
  • Added command-return shortcut and Send Post menu item.
  • Fixed crash when no internet connection.
  • Fixed potential 10.12 full-screen issues, missing button in welcome window.
  • Fixed some minor layout spacing issues.

item.title: Version 1.0b13
item.description:
Thank you for supporting Micro.blog! Here is what's new:

  • Added replies to user profile screen.
  • Added dragging image files to text view to attach them.
  • Improved header spacing, button highlighting, and other layout tweaks.
  • Fixed some actions opening separate copy of app if multiple versions installed.
  • Fixed accidental scrolling behind some headers.
  • Fixed timeline errors not presenting an alert.
  • Removed unused File menu items.

item.title: Version 1.0b12
item.description:
• Added sidebar icons.
  • Added automatic saving of latest new post draft.
  • Improved layout when there's no user description.
  • Fixed issues opening some links in default browser.
  • Fixed split view divider cursor.
  • Fixed layout issue when scrollbars are always shown.

item.title: Version 1.0b11
item.description: • Now supports both 10.12 Sierra and 10.13 High Sierra.

item.title: Version 1.0b10
item.description:
• Fixed refresh count.
  • Disabled sandboxing.

item.title: Version 1.0b10
item.description: • Fixed refresh count.

item.title: Version 1.0b9
item.description:
• Fixed crash with duplicate WordPress categories.
  • Fixed code-signing errors.

item.title: Version 1.0b7
item.description:
• Added discover pane.
  • Improved error handling.

item.title: Version 1.0b6
item.description:
• Added checking for new posts.
  • Fixed Micropub photo posting.

item.title: Version 1.0b5
item.description:
• Added conversation view.
  • More improvements.
